attributes.additional_details: it help normalize our community and identity
attributes.background: for people who are non binary, gender fluid or trans using gender binary bathrooms can be difficult. by having gender neutral bathrooms it will make life of people like this a lot easier and it can avoid criticism.

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about the provision of gender neutral bathrooms, however it's not clear where you want such bathrooms to be provided. In any case, the provision of public toilets is a matter for local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could start a petition calling on the Government to provide local authorities with funding to increase the provision of gender neutral public toilets in their area, if that is something you'd like to see happen.

You may wish to sign these petitions which call for related actions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585004
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562514
